feature_group_description: general features to track the infrastructure usage underlying applications. By tracking these features through an anomaly detection model we can find generalized deviations from normal.

features_list.feature_description: The percentage of CPU cores utilized on a per node basis
The percentage of memory currently being used by the node compared to the total limit
The amount of all network recreived and transfered for the worker node network interfaces in a cluster.
